author: jacopoc
msg: Refactored the very old code in the org.ofbiz.service.job package to leverage the Executor framework of java.util.concurrent rather than relying on ad-hoc synchronization and thread management: the new code is simpler, smaller and it is now easier to review and change the execution policy; two attributes of service-config.xsd have been deprecated as they are not used in the new version ("jobs" and "wait-millis").

author: danhaywood
msg: ISIS-14: adding support for persisting applib.Date class

msg: DERBY-5840: Silence deprecation warnings in the network client

author: kahatlen
msg: DERBY-5840: Compile network client with source and target level 1.5
